title: Mailvox: the hizzy in the shizzy
author: VD
content_html:
The White Buffalo is keeping track:

You finally won something! You’re somebody now!

He is, of course, referring to my tournament picks, wherein I correctly selected North Carolina to defeat Illinois in the NCAA championship game. I won’t deny a certain sense of satisfaction, but remembering the way in which the WB leapfrogged Chokechain and I to finish in the big NFL pick-16 money turns the victory to ashes in my mouth.
content_text:
The White Buffalo is keeping track:
You finally won something!  You’re somebody now!
He is, of course, referring to my tournament picks, wherein I correctly selected North Carolina to defeat Illinois in the NCAA championship game.  I won’t deny a certain sense of satisfaction, but remembering the way in which the WB leapfrogged Chokechain and I to finish in the big NFL pick-16 money turns the victory to ashes in my mouth.
